fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
*Size Up the Competition* — Choose a player each night. You'll learn whether their role's post number is higher or lower than the previous player you used Size Up the Competition on's, or your own if you haven't used it before.
*Make a Challenge* — Choose an opponent during the day. The next night, both of you will be unable to use night abilities and instead be placed in a public duel. You'll each secretly choose a player other than either of yourselves. Whoever picked the player with the lower post number is dealt a Powerful attack; if the post numbers are equal, you win. The players' roles aren't revealed.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You have a layer of Powerful defense that can block one attack.
